about_the_game:
The perfect addition for your adventure in the Wild West. The Digital Supporter Pack of Wild West Dynasty contains digital goodies, that will enhance your “Western” experience and bring you some exclusive materials: An exclusive novel and beautiful Wallpapers.

Exclusive Novel: Hancock’s Secret
The short story “Hancock’s Secret”, written by renowned author Ivan Ertlov (co-author of the Wild West Dynasty story). Tied into the main story, you can get a glimpse into the life of key characters, set 20 years before the events in Wild West Dynasty.

Exclusive Wallpapers
Exclusive backgrounds bring the unique Wild West atmosphere to your desktop.

How to access the Digital Goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the game’s install directory within the folder "Digital Supporter Pack Content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Wild West Dynasty) after the “Digital Supporter Pack” DLC has finished downloading.

Note: Only availabe in English and German language.

The perfect addition for your adventure in the Wild West. The Digital Supporter Pack of Wild West Dynasty contains digital goodies, that will enhance your “Western” experience and bring you some exclusive materials: An exclusive novel and beautiful Wallpapers.

Exclusive Novel: Hancock’s Secret
The short story “Hancock’s Secret”, written by renowned author Ivan Ertlov (co-author of the Wild West Dynasty story). Tied into the main story, you can get a glimpse into the life of key characters, set 20 years before the events in Wild West Dynasty.

Exclusive Wallpapers
Exclusive backgrounds bring the unique Wild West atmosphere to your desktop.

How to access the Digital Goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the game’s install directory within the folder "Digital Supporter Pack Content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Wild West Dynasty) after the “Digital Supporter Pack” DLC has finished downloading.

Note: Only availabe in English and German language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3 GHz), AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p, Low Quality Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.2 GHz), AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 Ti, AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, High Quality Settings

short_description: The perfect addition for your adventure in the Wild West. Enjoy more Wild West Dynasty with this Digital package of exclusive goodies.
